prompt:
Nurse: Alright, Mr. Dang. Please remember that you can ask me any questions at any time during our conversation. I see from your chart that you're getting this colonoscopy due to unexplained abdominal pain. I acknowledge that it can be quite a process to go through this procedure. How are you feeling about it?

Patient: I'm feeling okay.

Nurse: I'm sorry, Mr. Dang, could you please confirm if you're currently experiencing abdominal pain?

Patient: I

Nurse: I appreciate you letting me know. I'm going to take a moment to figure out the best way I can support you.

Patient: have been experiencing abdominal pain

Nurse: I see, Mr. Dang. Could you please tell me when your abdominal pain started?

Patient: It a few months ago.

responses.gpt4: I see, Mr. Dang. Has the pain gotten better, worse, or stayed the same over time?
responses.our_model: I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. Dang. Could you please describe your abdominal pain as generalized or localized?
